settings.content: Handsling

Experience aerodynamic speed and comfort in one machine. Each Handsling triathlon bike is painted in-house, assembled in Britain, and personally tailored for athletes who want every watt to count. The lightweight carbon fibre frame, integrated cockpit, and stable geometry deliver stiffness, control, and efficiency from the swim exit to run transition.

FREE PAINT - Order before 31st January to get free paint (applies to Handsling colour palette only).
Every Handsling bike is fully configurable. Select your model and groupset to start creating your dream bike.

settings.title: Learn how Handsling can personalise your bike to your performance needs.
Sized to You
settings.content: Every Handsling triathlon bike is custom-assembled to your fit. Through our Remote Tailored Sizing service, your position is dialled for aerodynamic efficiency and all-day comfort.

settings.title: Tailored to You
settings.content: Personalise your carbon triathlon bike from the ground up. Choose from 130+ colour combos (painted in-house in the UK), gearing, crank lengths, integrated handlebar widths, and wheelsets to match your race goals.

settings.title: Engineered for Performance
settings.content: Each triathlon bike uses a lightweight carbon-fibre frame and fully adjustable cockpit for stiffness, control, and speed optimisation. Trusted by elite riders worldwide and ridden to multiple victories.

settings.title: Ride Experience
settings.content:
• Balanced aerodynamics and stiffness deliver smooth, predictable handling at speed.
  • Aero geometry keeps your position low and efficient without sacrificing comfort.
  • Adjustable carbon cockpit lets you fine-tune stack, reach, and armrest width for optimal fit.
  • Tyre clearance up to 32 mm for added comfort and control on rougher courses.
  • Disc brakes provide consistent, powerful stopping even in wet conditions.
  • Carbon layup tuned to absorb vibration and reduce fatigue over long-course events.
  • Stable handling whether you’re cornering at pace or powering through crosswinds.

settings.title: Performance
settings.content:
• Manufactured using Toray T800, one of the highest-grade performance carbons on the market.
  • EPS internal moulding increases carbon compaction for a frame that’s tougher, lighter, and stiffer.
  • Reinforced head tube, down tube, bottom bracket shell, and chainstays – ensure efficient power transfer and lateral stiffness.
  • Every frame undergoes thorough quality control, with Handsling owning the frame moulds and our engineer overseeing all production.
  • Rigorous testing surpasses ISO standards to guarantee long-term strength and reliability.

settings.title: Design
settings.content:
• Designed 100% in-house by Handsling’s engineering team.
  • Integrated hidden cable routing reduces drag and maintains clean airflow across the frame.
  • Tube profiles remain aerodynamic at varied yaw angles, maximising efficiency on any course.
  • Up to 32 mm tyre clearance balances race-winning speed with additional comfort and control.
  • A short head tube promotes an aggressive aero posture, while a steep seat-tube angle positions the rider directly over the bottom bracket for efficient pedalling.
  • Low-slung base bar and fully adjustable cockpit support precision triathlon fit and custom armrest setups.
  • Compatible with modern wireless electronic disc-brake groupsets for seamless integration.
  • Narrow BSA, external threaded bottom bracket for improved aerodynamics and durability.

settings.title: Bike customisation
settings.content:
• Build your TSTRevo exactly how you race – from gearing and crank lengths to cockpit setup and wheel choice.
  • Choose from over 130 paint and logo combinations to create a truly custom aesthetic.
  • Available with a selection of disc or spoked wheels, with tyre and component options to match your terrain and distance goals.
  • Assembled in Handsling’s UK factory, with every detail aligned to your fit, style, and specification.
  • Remote Tailored Sizing ensures a precise, aerodynamic position without an in-person visit.

settings.title: Customer service
settings.content:
• Every Handsling triathlon bike comes with dedicated rider-first support from a team who live and breathe the sport.
  • Expect personal contact with the same experts who built your bike – ready to help with upgrades, advice, and servicing whenever you need it.
  • Our customer relationship goes far beyond handover, ensuring your setup continues to evolve with your training and goals.
  • Every frame is backed by a limited lifetime warranty, giving you lasting confidence in its strength and performance.
  • Whether it’s a first build or your next race machine, you’ll always get the same care and attention as our sponsored pros.

settings.title: TSTRevo: A Carbon Triathlon Bike for Pure Speed
settings.content:
'TSTRevo (pronounced TESTER-evo)'

The Handsling TSTRevo is a triathlon bike engineered for maximum aerodynamic efficiency and power transfer. Every tube profile is sculpted to slice through the air, while the carbon layup provides the stiffness and stability needed to convert every watt into forward motion. With a fully adjustable cockpit and race-proven geometry, it’s designed to help you set your next personal best.

Customise Your TSTRevo Today

Create your ultimate race machine – every TSTRevo is built to your exact specification and assembled in Britain for precision and performance that lasts. Your fit, your finish, your fastest ride yet.

settings.title: Tube profiles
settings.content: Deep aerodynamic tube profiles designed to perform in real-world conditions

settings.title: Tyre Clearance
settings.content: Clearance for up to 32mm tyres, providing a smooth ride on poor surfaces

settings.title: Cockpit
settings.content: Carbon cockpit featuring 38mm wide base bar and adjustable aerobar extensions

settings.title: Seat post
settings.content: Bladed aero carbon seat post with non-stick seat clamp expander bolt

settings.title: Power Transfer
settings.content: Massively stiff chainstays and bottom bracket area for maximum power transfer

settings.title: Ride Experience
settings.content:
• Fast, confident, and composed, the A1R0evo makes you a quicker rider whether on short-course triathlons or long-distance Ironman events.
  • Quick acceleration and stable cornering make it ideal for short-course and draft-legal triathlon racing.
  • For long-distance events, its aero tube profiles and lateral stiffness maximise speed and power transfer, ensuring every watt counts.
  • Race geometry provides predictable handling and composure, even in crosswinds or on technical descents.
  • Truncated D-shaped aero tubing maintains aerodynamic efficiency in real-world conditions, not just the wind tunnel.
  • Disc brakes add confidence and control on variable terrain and in all weather.
  • Internal cable routing keeps lines sleek for improved airflow and a premium finish.
  • The A1R0evoS refines this further with an upgraded Toray T1100 carbon layup, reducing weight and boosting stiffness for sharper response and faster acceleration.
  • 32mm tyre clearance allows for wider tyres that smooth road vibration, improving comfort and endurance over long triathlon courses.
  • The result: a lightweight, responsive machine that’s equally at home in transition zones or on the open road – the definition of a modern carbon fibre triathlon bike.

settings.title: Design & Manufacture
settings.content:
• Designed 100% in-house and engineered by Handsling’s carbon specialists.
  • Every frame is manufactured using Toray T800 carbon fibre (or T1100 on A1R0evoS) for the ideal blend of lightweight strength and stiffness.
  • Internal EPS moulding ensures uniform carbon compaction, making the frame tougher, lighter, and smoother inside..
  • Handsling owns all production tooling, guaranteeing consistency and precision.
  • Rigorous testing surpasses ISO standards to deliver long-term reliability in demanding race conditions.

settings.title: Bike customisation
settings.content:
• Fully custom builds: choose your groupset, wheels, bar setup, and finishing kit.
  • Can be fitted with Handsling’s one-piece integrated triathlon bar for optimal aero positioning.
  • Assembled in Handsling’s UK workshop according to rider fit and specification.
  • Choose from 130+ paint and logo combinations or limited-edition finishes for a unique design.
  • Remote Tailored Sizing ensures your bike fits perfectly to your tri position and body geometry.
  • Compatible with Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo components, plus a range of wheel depths and tyre options to match your course and conditions.

settings.title: Customer service
settings.content:
• Every Handsling triathlon bike is backed by personal, rider-focused support.
  • Our team of experienced cyclists and mechanics guide you from build to first ride – and long after.
  • We provide expert setup advice, upgrades, and servicing tailored to your racing goals.
  • All frames include a limited lifetime warranty, giving you total peace of mind.Expect the same professional attention our elite athletes receive, no matter your experience level.

settings.title: A1R0evo & A1R0evoS: Road Power Meets Triathlon Versatility
settings.content:
Developed from Handsling’s championship-winning road platform, the A1R0evo excels in draft-legal triathlon thanks to its aerodynamic performance, punchy acceleration, and assured handling. Raced internationally by professional triathletes including Jack Willis and Barlcay Izzard, it combines speed, stability, and all-day comfort in one finely balanced package.

Fitted with Handsling’s bespoke triathlon bars and deep-section wheels, the A1R0evo transforms into a lightweight aero road machine capable of conquering the long-course triathlons and full Ironman distance. Designed by Handsling from scratch, it’s stiff yet comfortable, lightweight yet robust, and highly versatile.

The A1R0evoS builds on this proven platform with an upgraded Toray T1100 carbon fibre layup, reducing weight while increasing stiffness for even greater power transfer and responsiveness. Together, they represent the evolution of carbon fibre triathlon bikes – aerodynamic, adaptable, and race-proven at every level.

Ready to Ride the A1R0evo or A1R0evoS?

Take the aerodynamic DNA of Handsling’s flagship road platform and make it your triathlon advantage. From draft-legal events to long-course endurance races, the A1R0evo range delivers comfort, control, and speed in every position.

settings.title: Which Handsling triathlon bike is right for me: TSTRevo, A1R0evo or A1R0evoS?
settings.content: The TSTRevo is a dedicated triathlon bike built for maximum aerodynamic efficiency and straight-line speed. The A1R0evo offers a more versatile platform – perfect for short course, draft-legal triathlons or riders who want comfort and agility alongside aero performance. The A1R0evoS refines that formula with lighter Toray T1100 carbon for sharper acceleration and pro-level stiffness. All three are carbon-fibre race machines assembled in Britain.

settings.title: What are the key advantages of a carbon triathlon bike for long-distance races?
settings.content: A carbon triathlon bike delivers the best balance of speed, comfort, and efficiency for long-distance events. Carbon fibre’s vibration-damping qualities reduce fatigue over hours in the saddle, while its stiffness ensures every watt goes into forward motion. Lightweight construction aids climbing, and aerodynamic tube shaping cuts drag – helping you maintain a faster, steadier pace throughout Ironman-length races.

settings.title: Is there a difference between a road bike and a triathlon bike?
settings.content: Yes. A triathlon bike refers to dedicated long course bikes that feature steeper seat-tube angles, shorter head tubes, and integrated aero tribars to place the rider in a more aerodynamic position. This design reduces frontal area and conserves energy for the run. A road bike is used for short course triathlons, in which you can draft other riders, and prioritises all-round handling and comfort, making it ideal for group rides and races. Handsling’s A1R0evo platform is ideal here, being aerodynamic yet versatile for short course triathlon events.

settings.title: What makes a carbon triathlon bike faster than other alternatives?
settings.content: Carbon fibre triathlon bikes are faster because the material allows precise aerodynamic shaping without extra weight. The result is a frame that slices through the air, remains stiff and responsive under power, and is light and agile on the climbs. Compared to aluminium or steel, carbon absorbs vibration more effectively, improving control and comfort so athletes can maintain aero position longer – a key factor in overall speed and endurance.

settings.title: How do I choose the right triathlon bike for my race distance?
settings.content: Short-course and draft-legal athletes often prefer an agile, aero-road-based triathlon bike like the A1R0evo for responsive handling in a closely packed bunch of athletes. For long-course or Ironman racing, the TSTRevo offers better aerodynamics and greater stability for sustained high-speed efforts. Consider factors such as fit, position, terrain, and comfort – Handsling’s Remote Tailored Sizing ensures your triathlon bike is optimised for your distance and riding style.

settings.title: Are Handsling triathlon bikes available to test ride in the UK?
settings.content: Yes. Riders can arrange a test ride or fitting at Handsling’s Hampshire facility. It’s an opportunity to experience the performance and fit of our carbon triathlon bikes before ordering. Test sessions are by appointment, giving you time with the team to discuss setup, components, and sizing in detail.

settings.title: Should I buy a carbon fibre triathlon bike or adapt my road bike?
settings.content: A dedicated carbon fibre triathlon bike like the TSTRevo offers the ultimate aerodynamic advantage for long-distance racing, thanks to its purpose-built geometry and integrated cockpit. However, many triathletes choose the A1R0evo for its versatility – an aero road frame that adapts perfectly to draft-legal or multi-discipline events. Both deliver the speed, stiffness, and comfort that define Handsling’s performance DNA.

settings.title: Can I visit the Handsling factory in Hampshire to see my bike being built?
settings.content: Yes, visits to the Handsling factory in Hampshire can be arranged by appointment. You’ll see where each triathlon bike is hand-assembled, meet the technicians, and discuss your custom build or paint finish in person. It’s a unique chance to experience the craftsmanship behind every Handsling frame. To arrange a visit, contact sales@handslingbikes.com or call 01420 612700.

settings.title: What other types of bikes do you offer besides triathlon?
settings.content: Our lineup spans fast and versatile carbon fibre road bikes, adventure-ready gravel bikes, mud-tested CX bikes, pure-speed track bikes, and aerodynamic time trial bikes.
